articles.title: 10 burning questions you might have about 'Overlord,' the World War II zombie horror film
articles.description: The new horror film 'Overlord' pits World War II G.I.s against Nazi zombies and monstrous experiments. We're here for all your burning questions.
articles.content: American paratroopers think they're investigating an old Nazi-occupied village. Things take a twisted turn when they discover an underground lab. USA TODAY Just when you think the scary movie season is over, here comes a bunch of undead Nazi experiments to li… [+4787 chars]
